title: Three Bed Room, 1 Bath, Town House $
posting_body: Recently rehabbed, Bi-level town house with 3 Bed room,1 bath, 1 car garage with second car parking on the driveway and additional parking available, All bedrooms are on the second floor.
All appliances including refrigerator,dishwasher, gas range and washer dryers are available.
Good School districts closer to the house, Lincoln elementary school 1.6 miles, Winston Jr.
Hi School 2 miles and Palatine high school 1 mile.
Closure to public transportation and shopping area.
Swimming pool  and recreation room is  available and managed by the Heritage Manor Association.
Monthly rent is $1805.00 and one month rent as security deposit.
Tenant pays for all utilities except water.
Tenant will pay $30 for credit check & criminal back ground check.
Please call or send a text message at  847-924-8420  for viewing.
